definition: an act that changes the form or character or substance of something
details:
noun
- an act that changes the form or character or substance of something
= synonyms: transubstantiation
- a qualitative change
= synonyms: shift
- (physics) the change of one chemical element into another (as by nuclear decay or radioactive bombardment)
= example: (physics) the change of one chemical element into another (as by nuclear decay or radioactive bombardment)
